TitlePrincipal Systems Engineer (NASA) - RemoteJob Posting DescriptionKBR is seeking a Principal Systems engineer to support NASA’s Earth Observing System Data and Information System (EOSDIS) Evolution and Development 3 (EED-3) contract as a Product Owner (PO) for the Cloud Metrics Team.  Raytheon’s EED-3 team provides Earth scientists and others access to data from NASA’s Earth Science missions.Job ResponsibilitiesDevelop and maintain platform data analytics development road-mapEngage with stakeholder community to collect and prioritize new development initiativesParticipate in all aspects of the software development lifecycle from user-story generation, design, development, automated testing, and operational supportContinually help the agile development team grow by sharing new ideas and industry best practicesOther duties as assignedRequired SkillsMinimum of 8 years experience within data analytics5+ years experience supporting systems engineering for large-scale distributed systemsData analytics and statistical methods including machine learning and anomaly detectionData schema development, data collection and ETL, and data lifecycle managementData visualization and communication experienceCloud infrastructure design, development, and implementation including serverless technologiesDesired SkillsAWS Certification (Solutions Architect, Developer, Data Analytics)2+ years ElasticSearch / Splunk4+ years experience Linux / RedHat2+ Infrastructure-as-Code (CloudFormation / Terraform)Python, JavaScript, Node.jsExperience working with development teams in an Agile methodology (SAFe / Scrum)Experience with DevOps, especially automated testing and continuous integrationStrong technical leadership, interpersonal communication, collaboration, and organizational skillExcellent verbal and written communication skillsEnergetic, self-motived, team-playerEducationB.S. in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, Mathematics, or related disciplineOtherThis position requires a U.S. Person who is eligible to obtain any required Export Authorization. All candidates must be able to pass a National Agency Clearance with Inquires (NACI) screening This position may work remotely. Relocation is NOT available. Quarterly travel for a few days may be required as COVID restrictions are lifted.In compliance with the U.S. federal government’s vaccine mandate, only candidates who are fully vaccinated for COVID-19 or have a reasonable accommodation or approved medical exception will be considered for this position.KBR is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, disability, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, national origin, veteran status, genetic information, union status and/or beliefs, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law.R2053024
